gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Flow discharge, precipitation and water stage measurement - HYDROMET
Flow discharge, precipitation and water stage measurement - HYDROMET

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Hydromet data from working group of the FCEFyN - UNC (Facultad de Ciencias Exactas, Físicas y Naturales - Universidad Nacional de Cordoba) during the RELAMPAGO campaign. In the study basin of the RELAMPAGO project (Carcarana River Basin) 30 measurement sites were periodically monitored. All the flow information registered with hydroacoustic techniques (ADCP, ADV) and Particle Image Velocimetry (PIV) is saved together with data of water stage and the rainfall and surface meteorological data that produced the runoff event.
